name: Wordabeasts
description: Wordabeasts is a multiplayer party game for 3-8 players that rewards fast-paced wit! Players will receive words on their mobile devices, think of a single clue word that connects them together, and earn points for guessing other player's words!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP SP2+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Each player will need an additional device with a modern web browser
